item.title: britt add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: britt add a quote by Anne Sexton
item.description: "I am God, la de dah." -- Anne Sexton

item.title: britt add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "It’s a pity if someone… has to console himself for the wreck of his days with the notion that somehow his voice, his work embodies the deepest, most obscure, freshest, rawest oyster of reality in the unfathomable refrigerator of the heart’s ocean, but I am such a one, and there you have it." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: britt add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "You can lead a horticulture, but you can't make her think." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: britt add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: britt add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I'm always happy," Sasha said. "Sometimes I just forget." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: britt add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Do not read, as children do, to amuse yourself, or like the ambitious, for the purpose of instruction. No, read in order to live." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: britt add a quote by Eric Roth
item.description: "For what it’s worth: it’s never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be. There’s no time limit, stop whenever you want. You can change or stay the same, there are no rules to this thing. We can make the best or the worst of it. I hope you make the best of it. And I hope you see things that startle you. I hope you feel things you never felt before. I hope you meet people with a different point of view. I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the courage to start all over again." -- Eric Roth

item.title: britt add a quote by Iris Chang
item.description: "When you believe you have a future, you think in terms of generations and years. When you do not, you live not just by the day — but by the minute." -- Iris Chang
